descripcion: Aloft Lima Miraflores is located in the best area of Miraflores, the gastronomical hub of Lima, Peru with a large variety of restaurants and coffee shops with different types of food. A 10-minute walk will take you to LarcoMar and the Miraflores's Malecon, where beautiful sunsets can be seen during summer. Aloft Lima Miraflores is surrounded by parks and independent shops, near to the bohemian district of Barranco, where the cultural and artistic diversity is huge and where two of the most important museums of Lima are located; the Museum of Modern Art, Pedro Osma and the MATE, from the renowned photographer Mario Testino. Aloft Lima Miraflores is located near cycle paths, running trails, and is well connected to the main routes to Lima's Historical Centre, the Financial Center of San Isidro, Larco Avenue, LarcoMar, and Kennedy Park, as well as the beach's circuit that surrounds the city and conducts to Jorge Chavez International Airpot (LIM).
servicios_ofrecidos: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

nombre: Costa Del Sol Wyndham Lima City
descripcion: With an outstanding location in the heart and soul of Peru's capital city, the Wyndham Costa del Sol Lima City is Lima's newest upscale international hotel. Our newly constructed Lima hotel in the limits of San Isidro boasts a great locale within walking distance of shops, cafés, restaurants and world-class shopping at Real Plaza Salaverry, as well as easy access to dozens of embassies, the financial district and economic hub of Lima - ideal for business travelers. Along with a stellar location, our non-smoking Lima hotel offers several upscale amenities and services, including full leisure facilities, an on-site casino, and exquisite on-site dining. With 730-square-meters (7,858-square-feet) of ultra-modern, state-of-the-art meeting and event space - the quintessential setting for successful conferences and picture-perfect weddings - our Lima hotel is the place to collaborate and celebrate. Add 144 spacious, elegantly appointed guestrooms, equipped with must-have amenities like plush bedding and in-room safe, Club Level Rooms which offer exclusive access to a VIP lounge, and spacious suites, and a restful and rejuvenating stay is yours. When your travels bring you to The City of Kings, we invite you to make the Wyndham Costa del Sol Lima hotel your premier hotel choice. Experience our legendary Peruvian hospitality and discover why your first stay will be the first of many at our Lima, Peru hotel.
servicios_ofrecidos: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

nombre: AC Hotel by Marriott Lima Miraflores
descripcion: AC Hotel by Marriott Lima Miraflores enjoys an unbeatable location in the Miraflores area of Lima, Peru with stunning ocean views. In summer, enjoy the beautiful sunsets that can be seen from the AC Library, our European influenced AC Kitchen, most of our rooms and our rooftop terrace.

descripcion: Hilton Lima Miraflores is ideally located in the heart of the Miraflores district, and within minutes to the vibrant Larcomar entertainment area, providing guests with recreational activities including shopping, theatre, museums, restaurants and parks. Our hotel combines traditional 18th century Peruvian architectonic elements with contemporary décor to create the perfect ambience while delivering the impeccable service demanded from corporate and leisure travelers. Our guestrooms are well-suited for those traveling on business or pleasure. include the Hilton Serenity™ Bed Collection, high speed wireless internet access, alarm clock with MP3 connection, in-room safe, mini-fridge and coffee maker with complimentary coffee. Our 50 deluxe rooms are located on the higher floors including details for offering a more comfortable. Our hotel features 44 well-appointed Executive rooms and 17 suites, all with access to the Executive Lounge and in room high speed internet. Our Lounge is an ideal place to simply relax, watch the news or catch up on emails. A complimentary breakfast, light lunch and dinner are offered daily, additional snacks and beverages are served throughout the day. Our Restaurant and Lounge feature an array of distinctive Peruvian-American fusion flavors, and provides the opportunity to taste the acclaimed Peruvian national cocktail: Pisco Sour. After a delicious meal, unwind with a refreshing beverage at the bar, which opens onto a terrace at street level, filling the space with natural light and creating a pleasant al fresco atmosphere. We offer 9 flexible meeting rooms, including a main ballroom that can accommodate up to 400 guests. Our hotel is adjacent to Daniel A. Carrion Convention Center which holds up to 1,000 attendees in their amphitheater and one block away from Casa Prado Meeting Center. We also provide a 24 hour fully equipped Business Center.

nombre: The Westin Lima Hotel & Convention Center

The hotel features 301 guest rooms with famous Heavenly Bed®, Heavenly Bath® and views of the city. Heavenly Spa by Westin® has 17 treatment rooms, Thermal Circuit, half-size Olympic and indoor pool, Beauty Salon and a fitness center Westin Workout®. The Convention Center has 17 meeting rooms and the largest ballroom is for 1600 people. The hotel has 2 restaurants: Market 770 & Maras, this one under the guide of the renowned chef Rafael Piqueras. It has 4 bars: InSitu Bar with an English style, Lobby Lounge, BarOBar and El Salar has its own personality.

descripcion: The BTH hotel is located in San Borja, one of the most central districts of Lima, adjacent to San Isidro, the main financial district. 19 km from Jorge Chavez International Airport and a short distance from the most important shopping centers. The rooms are anti-allergic, have king size beds and double beds, 55-inch Smart TV, steam baths and Bth tub, Sauna. BTH hotel is a transgressive and cosmopolitan space that opens doors and fosters new trends in art, design, fashion and culture. Guests enjoy free Wi-Fi and breakfast included in their rates. The Quimera restaurant proposes a contemporary Peruvian food concept where we use the inputs of our own organic garden. San Borja is a district that is committed to the environment and promotes a healthy life, BTH hotel offers guests courtesy bicycles so they can ride through its parks and appreciate its ecological conditions. Double occupancy rooms (double and single beds) and multiple occupancy rooms (up to 5 people). Our facilities include a pleasant dining room where breakfast will be gladly served.

Sol de Oro is a five star hotel strategically located at the commercial and residential center of the touristic district of Miraflores, offering easy access to the airport and Lima's main financial center. We have 112 wide and elegant suites, provided with the best comfort and guarantee of absolute pleasant stay. Free Wireless Internet access at the hotel, LCD TV, IPOD connection radio, duvets and goose feather pillows, central air conditioning, living room, dining room and kitchenette, digital safe boxes with security system, magnetic keys, non-smoking rooms, handicap suite, extra bed and cradle if required.

descripcion: With its stylish contemporary design, cutting-edge technology and ideal location, the flagship Casa Andina Premium Miraflores hotel is the top of its class in every aspect. Once the Miraflores Cesar's, Lima’s fondly remembered, original five-star hotel, this modern icon was dramatically transformed in 2008 into the capital’s newest luxury hotel. Its quintessential Limeno flavor reverberates in the exquisite art collection of contemporary local artists and prized colonial-era antiques, in both public spaces and accommodations. The 17-story hotel, with views over Miraflores and the Pacific coast, offers 148 sophisticated, contemporary luxury rooms and suites, with soundproofing and LCD flatscreen TVs in every room. First-class amenities include a heated, covered pool and breezy terrace, gymnasium with the latest exercise equipment, prestigious Joop salon & massage room, business center, and 5 multimedia-equipped corporate event & meeting rooms.
servicios_ofrecidos: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

descripcion: For those seeking practicality and the best cost-benefit ratio in Lima, the ibis Lima Larco Miraflores is the perfect choice. With a complete structure, the hotel offers free wi-fi, breakfast with typical dishes of Peruvian cuisine and modern and comfortable rooms. It is a good option for those looking for a cozy place to rest after busy days. The rooms are comfortable and can accommodate families or people with reduced mobility. But if you want a complete cultural experience, you have to go to the QCeviche! Restaurant, which offers Peruvian cuisine in a unique way. There, you will find from traditional recipes to modern dishes. During your stay, try the delicious ceviche or lomo saltado. In addition, the hotel bar opens 24 hours and has a varied cocktail menu. It is an excellent opportunity to try pisco sour, a typical cocktail of the region. The hotel has a privileged location and provides easy access to the main tourist places of the city, such as the Larcomar Shopping Center, which has one of the most impressive views of the city and gathers shops, restaurants, cinemas and bars, the Parque del Amor with the famous sculpture El Beso and the ancient ruins of Huaca Huallamarca, an unmissable archaeological site. But if you want to relax, you must visit Kennedy Park to be connected to nature or appreciate the sunset on the Miraflores Boardwalk. Lima is an incredible destination, where there is much to do. You will not regret taking time to discover the many attractions of the city!

Lima has a culture of its own: A colonial history mixed with pre-columbian civilizations and african immigration. Specially rich in food, architecture, horsemanship, music and dance it was born in the central coast of Perú. After the independence, the result was a mixture of cultures that today are part of what we call Lima Criolla. From the sounds of guitars and Peruvian Cajón (Peruvian Box Drum) and the voices of Lucha Reyes and Chabuca Granda to the flavors of Teresa Izquierdo. From Plaza de Acho and classic wooden balconies to Mamacona and the majesticness of caballos de paso and Marinera, this particular mix of spanish, indian and african cultures is only found here in the coast of Peru as represented by the paintings of Pancho Fierro. Lima is now also a gastronimic capital of the world. From Selina you may explore and get to know the city with the view of a local person. We program guided bike tours to see modern Lima (Miraflores and Barranco) and Lima Colonia (Lima center). You can tour Miraflores and Barranco walking with a local guide who will take you to the best “huariques” (non-tourist restaurants). You can schedule full days to do adventure sports in Huacachina, trekking in Lucumo hills, and get know the San Lorenzo island in the province of Callao, among other activities. From Selina, we help you program your next destination, we offer the best prices on bus tickets with stops to choose nationally and tourist assistance during the tour. We are at a 15 minute walk from the nearest beach. If you are an expert surfer you may rent surfboards here or, if you are inexperienced, you may take private and group clases.

Aloft Lima Miraflores is located near cycle paths, running trails, and is well connected to the main routes to Lima's Historical Centre, the Financial Center of San Isidro, Larco Avenue, LarcoMar, and Kennedy Park, as well as the beach's circuit that surrounds the city and conducts to Jorge Chavez International Airpot (LIM).
servicios_ofrecidos: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

nombre: Costa Del Sol Wyndham Lima City
descripcion: With an outstanding location in the heart and soul of Peru's capital city, the Wyndham Costa del Sol Lima City is Lima's newest upscale international hotel. Our newly constructed Lima hotel in the limits of San Isidro boasts a great locale within walking distance of shops, cafés, restaurants and world-class shopping at Real Plaza Salaverry, as well as easy access to dozens of embassies, the financial district and economic hub of Lima - ideal for business travelers. Along with a stellar location, our non-smoking Lima hotel offers several upscale amenities and services, including full leisure facilities, an on-site casino, and exquisite on-site dining. With 730-square-meters (7,858-square-feet) of ultra-modern, state-of-the-art meeting and event space - the quintessential setting for successful conferences and picture-perfect weddings - our Lima hotel is the place to collaborate and celebrate. Add 144 spacious, elegantly appointed guestrooms, equipped with must-have amenities like plush bedding and in-room safe, Club Level Rooms which offer exclusive access to a VIP lounge, and spacious suites, and a restful and rejuvenating stay is yours. When your travels bring you to The City of Kings, we invite you to make the Wyndham Costa del Sol Lima hotel your premier hotel choice. Experience our legendary Peruvian hospitality and discover why your first stay will be the first of many at our Lima, Peru hotel.
servicios_ofrecidos: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

nombre: AC Hotel by Marriott Lima Miraflores
descripcion: AC Hotel by Marriott Lima Miraflores enjoys an unbeatable location in the Miraflores area of Lima, Peru with stunning ocean views. In summer, enjoy the beautiful sunsets that can be seen from the AC Library, our European influenced AC Kitchen, most of our rooms and our rooftop terrace.
servicios_ofrecidos: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

descripcion: Hilton Lima Miraflores is ideally located in the heart of the Miraflores district, and within minutes to the vibrant Larcomar entertainment area, providing guests with recreational activities including shopping, theatre, museums, restaurants and parks. Our hotel combines traditional 18th century Peruvian architectonic elements with contemporary décor to create the perfect ambience while delivering the impeccable service demanded from corporate and leisure travelers. Our guestrooms are well-suited for those traveling on business or pleasure. include the Hilton Serenity™ Bed Collection, high speed wireless internet access, alarm clock with MP3 connection, in-room safe, mini-fridge and coffee maker with complimentary coffee. Our 50 deluxe rooms are located on the higher floors including details for offering a more comfortable. Our hotel features 44 well-appointed Executive rooms and 17 suites, all with access to the Executive Lounge and in room high speed internet. Our Lounge is an ideal place to simply relax, watch the news or catch up on emails. A complimentary breakfast, light lunch and dinner are offered daily, additional snacks and beverages are served throughout the day. Our Restaurant and Lounge feature an array of distinctive Peruvian-American fusion flavors, and provides the opportunity to taste the acclaimed Peruvian national cocktail: Pisco Sour. After a delicious meal, unwind with a refreshing beverage at the bar, which opens onto a terrace at street level, filling the space with natural light and creating a pleasant al fresco atmosphere. We offer 9 flexible meeting rooms, including a main ballroom that can accommodate up to 400 guests. Our hotel is adjacent to Daniel A. Carrion Convention Center which holds up to 1,000 attendees in their amphitheater and one block away from Casa Prado Meeting Center. We also provide a 24 hour fully equipped Business Center.
servicios_ofrecidos: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

nombre: The Westin Lima Hotel & Convention Center
descripcion: The Westin Lima Hotel & Convention Center is located in Lima’s vibrant financial and shopping district of San Isidro, the hotel is just 15 kilometers from Jorge Chavez International Airport (LIM) aand minutes from a dazzling selection of restaurants, galleries, and parks, as well as banks and corporate headquarters. The hotel features 301 guest rooms with famous Heavenly Bed®, Heavenly Bath® and views of the city. Heavenly Spa by Westin® has 17 treatment rooms, Thermal Circuit, half-size Olympic and indoor pool, Beauty Salon and a fitness center Westin Workout®. The Convention Center has 17 meeting rooms and the largest ballroom is for 1600 people. The hotel has 2 restaurants: Market 770 & Maras, this one under the guide of the renowned chef Rafael Piqueras. It has 4 bars: InSitu Bar with an English style, Lobby Lounge, BarOBar and El Salar has its own personality.

descripcion: Sol de Oro is a five star hotel strategically located at the commercial and residential center of the touristic district of Miraflores, offering easy access to the airport and Lima's main financial center. We have 112 wide and elegant suites, provided with the best comfort and guarantee of absolute pleasant stay. Free Wireless Internet access at the hotel, LCD TV, IPOD connection radio, duvets and goose feather pillows, central air conditioning, living room, dining room and kitchenette, digital safe boxes with security system, magnetic keys, non-smoking rooms, handicap suite, extra bed and cradle if required.
servicios_ofrecidos: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

descripcion: With its stylish contemporary design, cutting-edge technology and ideal location, the flagship Casa Andina Premium Miraflores hotel is the top of its class in every aspect. Once the Miraflores Cesar's, Lima’s fondly remembered, original five-star hotel, this modern icon was dramatically transformed in 2008 into the capital’s newest luxury hotel. Its quintessential Limeno flavor reverberates in the exquisite art collection of contemporary local artists and prized colonial-era antiques, in both public spaces and accommodations. The 17-story hotel, with views over Miraflores and the Pacific coast, offers 148 sophisticated, contemporary luxury rooms and suites, with soundproofing and LCD flatscreen TVs in every room. First-class amenities include a heated, covered pool and breezy terrace, gymnasium with the latest exercise equipment, prestigious Joop salon & massage room, business center, and 5 multimedia-equipped corporate event & meeting rooms.
servicios_ofrecidos: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

descripcion: For those seeking practicality and the best cost-benefit ratio in Lima, the ibis Lima Larco Miraflores is the perfect choice. With a complete structure, the hotel offers free wi-fi, breakfast with typical dishes of Peruvian cuisine and modern and comfortable rooms. It is a good option for those looking for a cozy place to rest after busy days. The rooms are comfortable and can accommodate families or people with reduced mobility. But if you want a complete cultural experience, you have to go to the QCeviche! Restaurant, which offers Peruvian cuisine in a unique way. There, you will find from traditional recipes to modern dishes. During your stay, try the delicious ceviche or lomo saltado. In addition, the hotel bar opens 24 hours and has a varied cocktail menu. It is an excellent opportunity to try pisco sour, a typical cocktail of the region. The hotel has a privileged location and provides easy access to the main tourist places of the city, such as the Larcomar Shopping Center, which has one of the most impressive views of the city and gathers shops, restaurants, cinemas and bars, the Parque del Amor with the famous sculpture El Beso and the ancient ruins of Huaca Huallamarca, an unmissable archaeological site. But if you want to relax, you must visit Kennedy Park to be connected to nature or appreciate the sunset on the Miraflores Boardwalk. Lima is an incredible destination, where there is much to do. You will not regret taking time to discover the many attractions of the city!

Lima has a culture of its own: A colonial history mixed with pre-columbian civilizations and african immigration. Specially rich in food, architecture, horsemanship, music and dance it was born in the central coast of Perú. After the independence, the result was a mixture of cultures that today are part of what we call Lima Criolla. From the sounds of guitars and Peruvian Cajón (Peruvian Box Drum) and the voices of Lucha Reyes and Chabuca Granda to the flavors of Teresa Izquierdo. From Plaza de Acho and classic wooden balconies to Mamacona and the majesticness of caballos de paso and Marinera, this particular mix of spanish, indian and african cultures is only found here in the coast of Peru as represented by the paintings of Pancho Fierro. Lima is now also a gastronimic capital of the world. From Selina you may explore and get to know the city with the view of a local person. We program guided bike tours to see modern Lima (Miraflores and Barranco) and Lima Colonia (Lima center). You can tour Miraflores and Barranco walking with a local guide who will take you to the best “huariques” (non-tourist restaurants). You can schedule full days to do adventure sports in Huacachina, trekking in Lucumo hills, and get know the San Lorenzo island in the province of Callao, among other activities. From Selina, we help you program your next destination, we offer the best prices on bus tickets with stops to choose nationally and tourist assistance during the tour. We are at a 15 minute walk from the nearest beach. If you are an expert surfer you may rent surfboards here or, if you are inexperienced, you may take private and group clases.

You can tour Miraflores and Barranco walking with a local guide who will take you to the best “huariques” (non-tourist restaurants). You can schedule full days to do adventure sports in Huacachina, trekking in Lucumo hills, and get know the San Lorenzo island in the province of Callao, among other activities. From Selina, we help you program your next destination, we offer the best prices on bus tickets with stops to choose nationally and tourist assistance during the tour. We are at a 15 minute walk from the nearest beach. If you are an expert surfer you may rent surfboards here or, if you are inexperienced, you may take private and group clases.

Lima has a culture of its own: A colonial history mixed with pre-columbian civilizations and african immigration. Specially rich in food, architecture, horsemanship, music and dance it was born in the central coast of Perú. After the independence, the result was a mixture of cultures that today are part of what we call Lima Criolla. From the sounds of guitars and Peruvian Cajón (Peruvian Box Drum) and the voices of Lucha Reyes and Chabuca Granda to the flavors of Teresa Izquierdo. From Plaza de Acho and classic wooden balconies to Mamacona and the majesticness of caballos de paso and Marinera, this particular mix of spanish, indian and african cultures is only found here in the coast of Peru as represented by the paintings of Pancho Fierro. Vila Santa Hotel is not the largest or most luxurious one, but it is the best one when it comes to service. Our primary goal is to provide to you the best service and comfort so that your stay is bright, easy, and at home. Even more we will provide to you with the services that you need during your stay, so that you can concentrate in your business. We service our guests with a smile.We started out very small, but our commitment to our guests and determination to attend your demands brought us to what we are now. We are always looking for your feedback because it allows us to improve upon what we have already established Vila Santa provides you full-equipped guest rooms, designed to meet your comfort and relaxation needs. The courteous and efficient staff will do their utmost to make your stay a pleasant one.A famous Peruvian chef, Gaston Acurio, once said : "El mas o menos, no es suficiente para que el cliente regrese" (middle terms in service are not going to make customers to come back). descripcion: For those seeking practicality and the best cost-benefit ratio in Lima, the ibis Lima Larco Miraflores is the perfect choice. With a complete structure, the hotel offers free wi-fi, breakfast with typical dishes of Peruvian cuisine and modern and comfortable rooms. It is a good option for those looking for a cozy place to rest after busy days. The rooms are comfortable and can accommodate families or people with reduced mobility. But if you want a complete cultural experience, you have to go to the QCeviche! Restaurant, which offers Peruvian cuisine in a unique way. There, you will find from traditional recipes to modern dishes. During your stay, try the delicious ceviche or lomo saltado. In addition, the hotel bar opens 24 hours and has a varied cocktail menu. It is an excellent opportunity to try pisco sour, a typical cocktail of the region. The hotel has a privileged location and provides easy access to the main tourist places of the city, such as the Larcomar Shopping Center, which has one of the most impressive views of the city and gathers shops, restaurants, cinemas and bars, the Parque del Amor with the famous sculpture El Beso and the ancient ruins of Huaca Huallamarca, an unmissable archaeological site. But if you want to relax, you must visit Kennedy Park to be connected to nature or appreciate the sunset on the Miraflores Boardwalk. Lima is an incredible destination, where there is much to do. You will not regret taking time to discover the many attractions of the city!

The BTH hotel is located in San Borja, one of the most central districts of Lima, adjacent to San Isidro, the main financial district. 19 km from Jorge Chavez International Airport and a short distance from the most important shopping centers. The rooms are anti-allergic, have king size beds and double beds, 55-inch Smart TV, steam baths and Bth tub, Sauna. BTH hotel is a transgressive and cosmopolitan space that opens doors and fosters new trends in art, design, fashion and culture. Guests enjoy free Wi-Fi and breakfast included in their rates. The Quimera restaurant proposes a contemporary Peruvian food concept where we use the inputs of our own organic garden. San Borja is a district that is committed to the environment and promotes a healthy life, BTH hotel offers guests courtesy bicycles so they can ride through its parks and appreciate its ecological conditions. Let yourself be welcomed by our highest standards of Health and quality in each of our spaces. The BTH Health anti-stress is an exclusive and private, sensory experience for guests when they begin the relaxation process by starting with the dry room and steam as well as relaxing jets of water from the bath tub. A UNIQUE CONCEPT OF A PRIVATE SPA, PROVIDING A SENSATION OF "REVIVAL, HEALTH, REST AND ESCAPE",
servicios_ofrecidos: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

nombre: Costa del Sol Wyndham Lima Airport
descripcion: From an enviable location within mere steps of Jorge Chavez International Airport, easy access to all of Lima's many cultural and historic wonders, and a wealth of upscale services and amenities designed for discerning travelers, our Wyndham Costa del Sol Lima Airport is the premier upscale international hotel in Peru's capital city. Our Lima Airport hotel is perfect for those in transit, with the unparalleled ability to walk to or from your flight within minutes of our front door; with business facilities that are designed to underscore a stress-free, productive stay - including 312-square-meters of flexible, first-class meeting and event space - and 24-hour dining options, we have endeavored to deliver round-the-clock service in a world where round-the-clock is the norm. For those who may be traveling on leisure, or simply seeking relaxation and rejuvenation, our full range of leisure facilities includes a 24-hour Spa with massage services for ultimate relaxation. Add 192 graciously appointed, non-smoking guestrooms that effortlessly fuse form and function, and all equipped with must-have amenities for today's busy traveler, and a restful sojourn is assured. And, best of all, our professional, top-notch associates are at your service 24 hours a day, 7 days a week and look forward to welcoming you with our customary time-honored Peruvian grace and warm hospitality. Rest assured that here at the Wyndham Costa del Sol Lima Airport we treat you like royalty and look forward to being your only hotel of choice when your travels bring you to The City of the Kings - Lima, Peru.

With its stylish contemporary design, cutting-edge technology and ideal location, the flagship Casa Andina Premium Miraflores hotel is the top of its class in every aspect. Once the Miraflores Cesar's, Lima’s fondly remembered, original five-star hotel, this modern icon was dramatically transformed in 2008 into the capital’s newest luxury hotel. Its quintessential Limeno flavor reverberates in the exquisite art collection of contemporary local artists and prized colonial-era antiques, in both public spaces and accommodations. The 17-story hotel, with views over Miraflores and the Pacific coast, offers 148 sophisticated, contemporary luxury rooms and suites, with soundproofing and LCD flatscreen TVs in every room. First-class amenities include a heated, covered pool and breezy terrace, gymnasium with the latest exercise equipment, prestigious Joop salon & massage room, business center, and 5 multimedia-equipped corporate event & meeting rooms.
servicios_ofrecidos: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

For those seeking practicality and the best cost-benefit ratio in Lima, the ibis Lima Larco Miraflores is the perfect choice. With a complete structure, the hotel offers free wi-fi, breakfast with typical dishes of Peruvian cuisine and modern and comfortable rooms. It is a good option for those looking for a cozy place to rest after busy days. The rooms are comfortable and can accommodate families or people with reduced mobility. But if you want a complete cultural experience, you have to go to the QCeviche! Restaurant, which offers Peruvian cuisine in a unique way. There, you will find from traditional recipes to modern dishes. During your stay, try the delicious ceviche or lomo saltado. In addition, the hotel bar opens 24 hours and has a varied cocktail menu. It is an excellent opportunity to try pisco sour, a typical cocktail of the region. The hotel has a privileged location and provides easy access to the main tourist places of the city, such as the Larcomar Shopping Center, which has one of the most impressive views of the city and gathers shops, restaurants, cinemas and bars, the Parque del Amor with the famous sculpture El Beso and the ancient ruins of Huaca Huallamarca, an unmissable archaeological site. But if you want to relax, you must visit Kennedy Park to be connected to nature or appreciate the sunset on the Miraflores Boardwalk. Lima is an incredible destination, where there is much to do. You will not regret taking time to discover the many attractions of the city!

descripcion: With its stylish contemporary design, cutting-edge technology and ideal location, the flagship Casa Andina Premium Miraflores hotel is the top of its class in every aspect. Once the Miraflores Cesar's, Lima’s fondly remembered, original five-star hotel, this modern icon was dramatically transformed in 2008 into the capital’s newest luxury hotel. Its quintessential Limeno flavor reverberates in the exquisite art collection of contemporary local artists and prized colonial-era antiques, in both public spaces and accommodations. The 17-story hotel, with views over Miraflores and the Pacific coast, offers 148 sophisticated, contemporary luxury rooms and suites, with soundproofing and LCD flatscreen TVs in every room. First-class amenities include a heated, covered pool and breezy terrace, gymnasium with the latest exercise equipment, prestigious Joop salon & massage room, business center, and 5 multimedia-equipped corporate event & meeting rooms.
servicios_ofrecidos: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

descripcion: Lima has a culture of its own: A colonial history mixed with pre-columbian civilizations and african immigration. Specially rich in food, architecture, horsemanship, music and dance it was born in the central coast of Perú. After the independence, the result was a mixture of cultures that today are part of what we call Lima Criolla. From the sounds of guitars and Peruvian Cajón (Peruvian Box Drum) and the voices of Lucha Reyes and Chabuca Granda to the flavors of Teresa Izquierdo. From Plaza de Acho and classic wooden balconies to Mamacona and the majesticness of caballos de paso and Marinera, this particular mix of spanish, indian and african cultures is only found here in the coast of Peru as represented by the paintings of Pancho Fierro. Lima is now also a gastronimic capital of the world. From Selina you may explore and get to know the city with the view of a local person. We program guided bike tours to see modern Lima (Miraflores and Barranco) and Lima Colonia (Lima center). You can tour Miraflores and Barranco walking with a local guide who will take you to the best “huariques” (non-tourist restaurants). You can schedule full days to do adventure sports in Huacachina, trekking in Lucumo hills, and get know the San Lorenzo island in the province of Callao, among other activities. From Selina, we help you program your next destination, we offer the best prices on bus tickets with stops to choose nationally and tourist assistance during the tour. We are at a 15 minute walk from the nearest beach. If you are an expert surfer you may rent surfboards here or, if you are inexperienced, you may take private and group clases.

descripcion: With its stylish contemporary design, cutting-edge technology and ideal location, the flagship Casa Andina Premium Miraflores hotel is the top of its class in every aspect. Once the Miraflores Cesar's, Lima’s fondly remembered, original five-star hotel, this modern icon was dramatically transformed in 2008 into the capital’s newest luxury hotel. Its quintessential Limeno flavor reverberates in the exquisite art collection of contemporary local artists and prized colonial-era antiques, in both public spaces and accommodations. The 17-story hotel, with views over Miraflores and the Pacific coast, offers 148 sophisticated, contemporary luxury rooms and suites, with soundproofing and LCD flatscreen TVs in every room. First-class amenities include a heated, covered pool and breezy terrace, gymnasium with the latest exercise equipment, prestigious Joop salon & massage room, business center, and 5 multimedia-equipped corporate event & meeting rooms.
servicios_ofrecidos: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

descripcion: Lima has a culture of its own: A colonial history mixed with pre-columbian civilizations and african immigration. Specially rich in food, architecture, horsemanship, music and dance it was born in the central coast of Perú. After the independence, the result was a mixture of cultures that today are part of what we call Lima Criolla. From the sounds of guitars and Peruvian Cajón (Peruvian Box Drum) and the voices of Lucha Reyes and Chabuca Granda to the flavors of Teresa Izquierdo. From Plaza de Acho and classic wooden balconies to Mamacona and the majesticness of caballos de paso and Marinera, this particular mix of spanish, indian and african cultures is only found here in the coast of Peru as represented by the paintings of Pancho Fierro. Lima is now also a gastronimic capital of the world. From Selina you may explore and get to know the city with the view of a local person. We program guided bike tours to see modern Lima (Miraflores and Barranco) and Lima Colonia (Lima center). You can tour Miraflores and Barranco walking with a local guide who will take you to the best “huariques” (non-tourist restaurants). You can schedule full days to do adventure sports in Huacachina, trekking in Lucumo hills, and get know the San Lorenzo island in the province of Callao, among other activities. From Selina, we help you program your next destination, we offer the best prices on bus tickets with stops to choose nationally and tourist assistance during the tour. We are at a 15 minute walk from the nearest beach. If you are an expert surfer you may rent surfboards here or, if you are inexperienced, you may take private and group clases.

descripcion: Vila Santa Hotel is not the largest or most luxurious one, but it is the best one when it comes to service. Our primary goal is to provide to you the best service and comfort so that your stay is bright, easy, and at home. Even more we will provide to you with the services that you need during your stay, so that you can concentrate in your business. We service our guests with a smile.We started out very small, but our commitment to our guests and determination to attend your demands brought us to what we are now. We are always looking for your feedback because it allows us to improve upon what we have already established Vila Santa provides you full-equipped guest rooms, designed to meet your comfort and relaxation needs. The courteous and efficient staff will do their utmost to make your stay a pleasant one.A famous Peruvian chef, Gaston Acurio, once said : "El mas o menos, no es suficiente para que el cliente regrese" (middle terms in service are not going to make customers to come back). We agree 100%.Therefore our commitment to you is from when you walk in, and we will be looking forward to see you back.

descripcion: For those seeking practicality and the best cost-benefit ratio in Lima, the ibis Lima Larco Miraflores is the perfect choice. With a complete structure, the hotel offers free wi-fi, breakfast with typical dishes of Peruvian cuisine and modern and comfortable rooms. It is a good option for those looking for a cozy place to rest after busy days. The rooms are comfortable and can accommodate families or people with reduced mobility. But if you want a complete cultural experience, you have to go to the QCeviche! Restaurant, which offers Peruvian cuisine in a unique way. There, you will find from traditional recipes to modern dishes. During your stay, try the delicious ceviche or lomo saltado. In addition, the hotel bar opens 24 hours and has a varied cocktail menu. It is an excellent opportunity to try pisco sour, a typical cocktail of the region. The hotel has a privileged location and provides easy access to the main tourist places of the city, such as the Larcomar Shopping Center, which has one of the most impressive views of the city and gathers shops, restaurants, cinemas and bars, the Parque del Amor with the famous sculpture El Beso and the ancient ruins of Huaca Huallamarca, an unmissable archaeological site. But if you want to relax, you must visit Kennedy Park to be connected to nature or appreciate the sunset on the Miraflores Boardwalk. Lima is an incredible destination, where there is much to do. You will not regret taking time to discover the many attractions of the city!

The BTH hotel is located in San Borja, one of the most central districts of Lima, adjacent to San Isidro, the main financial district. 19 km from Jorge Chavez International Airport and a short distance from the most important shopping centers. The rooms are anti-allergic, have king size beds and double beds, 55-inch Smart TV, steam baths and Bth tub, Sauna. BTH hotel is a transgressive and cosmopolitan space that opens doors and fosters new trends in art, design, fashion and culture. Guests enjoy free Wi-Fi and breakfast included in their rates. The Quimera restaurant proposes a contemporary Peruvian food concept where we use the inputs of our own organic garden. San Borja is a district that is committed to the environment and promotes a healthy life, BTH hotel offers guests courtesy bicycles so they can ride through its parks and appreciate its ecological conditions. Let yourself be welcomed by our highest standards of Health and quality in each of our spaces. The BTH Health anti-stress is an exclusive and private, sensory experience for guests when they begin the relaxation process by starting with the dry room and steam as well as relaxing jets of water from the bath tub. A UNIQUE CONCEPT OF A PRIVATE SPA, PROVIDING A SENSATION OF "REVIVAL, HEALTH, REST AND ESCAPE",

descripcion: From an enviable location within mere steps of Jorge Chavez International Airport, easy access to all of Lima's many cultural and historic wonders, and a wealth of upscale services and amenities designed for discerning travelers, our Wyndham Costa del Sol Lima Airport is the premier upscale international hotel in Peru's capital city. Our Lima Airport hotel is perfect for those in transit, with the unparalleled ability to walk to or from your flight within minutes of our front door; with business facilities that are designed to underscore a stress-free, productive stay - including 312-square-meters of flexible, first-class meeting and event space - and 24-hour dining options, we have endeavored to deliver round-the-clock service in a world where round-the-clock is the norm. For those who may be traveling on leisure, or simply seeking relaxation and rejuvenation, our full range of leisure facilities includes a 24-hour Spa with massage services for ultimate relaxation. Add 192 graciously appointed, non-smoking guestrooms that effortlessly fuse form and function, and all equipped with must-have amenities for today's busy traveler, and a restful sojourn is assured. And, best of all, our professional, top-notch associates are at your service 24 hours a day, 7 days a week and look forward to welcoming you with our customary time-honored Peruvian grace and warm hospitality. Rest assured that here at the Wyndham Costa del Sol Lima Airport we treat you like royalty and look forward to being your only hotel of choice when your travels bring you to The City of the Kings - Lima, Peru.

descripcion: Lima has a culture of its own: A colonial history mixed with pre-columbian civilizations and african immigration. Specially rich in food, architecture, horsemanship, music and dance it was born in the central coast of Perú. After the independence, the result was a mixture of cultures that today are part of what we call Lima Criolla. From the sounds of guitars and Peruvian Cajón (Peruvian Box Drum) and the voices of Lucha Reyes and Chabuca Granda to the flavors of Teresa Izquierdo. From Plaza de Acho and classic wooden balconies to Mamacona and the majesticness of caballos de paso and Marinera, this particular mix of spanish, indian and african cultures is only found here in the coast of Peru as represented by the paintings of Pancho Fierro. Lima is now also a gastronimic capital of the world. From Selina you may explore and get to know the city with the view of a local person. We program guided bike tours to see modern Lima (Miraflores and Barranco) and Lima Colonia (Lima center). You can tour Miraflores and Barranco walking with a local guide who will take you to the best “huariques” (non-tourist restaurants). You can schedule full days to do adventure sports in Huacachina, trekking in Lucumo hills, and get know the San Lorenzo island in the province of Callao, among other activities. From Selina, we help you program your next destination, we offer the best prices on bus tickets with stops to choose nationally and tourist assistance during the tour. We are at a 15 minute walk from the nearest beach. If you are an expert surfer you may rent surfboards here or, if you are inexperienced, you may take private and group clases.

Free Wireless Internet access at the hotel, LCD TV, IPOD connection radio, duvets and goose feather pillows, central air conditioning, living room, dining room and kitchenette, digital safe boxes with security system, magnetic keys, non-smoking rooms, handicap suite, extra bed and cradle if required.

descripcion: With its stylish contemporary design, cutting-edge technology and ideal location, the flagship Casa Andina Premium Miraflores hotel is the top of its class in every aspect. Once the Miraflores Cesar's, Lima’s fondly remembered, original five-star hotel, this modern icon was dramatically transformed in 2008 into the capital’s newest luxury hotel. Its quintessential Limeno flavor reverberates in the exquisite art collection of contemporary local artists and prized colonial-era antiques, in both public spaces and accommodations. The 17-story hotel, with views over Miraflores and the Pacific coast, offers 148 sophisticated, contemporary luxury rooms and suites, with soundproofing and LCD flatscreen TVs in every room. First-class amenities include a heated, covered pool and breezy terrace, gymnasium with the latest exercise equipment, prestigious Joop salon & massage room, business center, and 5 multimedia-equipped corporate event & meeting rooms.
servicios_ofrecidos: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

descripcion: Lima has a culture of its own: A colonial history mixed with pre-columbian civilizations and african immigration. Specially rich in food, architecture, horsemanship, music and dance it was born in the central coast of Perú. After the independence, the result was a mixture of cultures that today are part of what we call Lima Criolla. From the sounds of guitars and Peruvian Cajón (Peruvian Box Drum) and the voices of Lucha Reyes and Chabuca Granda to the flavors of Teresa Izquierdo. From Plaza de Acho and classic wooden balconies to Mamacona and the majesticness of caballos de paso and Marinera, this particular mix of spanish, indian and african cultures is only found here in the coast of Peru as represented by the paintings of Pancho Fierro. Lima is now also a gastronimic capital of the world. From Selina you may explore and get to know the city with the view of a local person. We program guided bike tours to see modern Lima (Miraflores and Barranco) and Lima Colonia (Lima center). You can tour Miraflores and Barranco walking with a local guide who will take you to the best “huariques” (non-tourist restaurants). You can schedule full days to do adventure sports in Huacachina, trekking in Lucumo hills, and get know the San Lorenzo island in the province of Callao, among other activities. From Selina, we help you program your next destination, we offer the best prices on bus tickets with stops to choose nationally and tourist assistance during the tour. We are at a 15 minute walk from the nearest beach. If you are an expert surfer you may rent surfboards here or, if you are inexperienced, you may take private and group clases.

The BTH hotel is located in San Borja, one of the most central districts of Lima, adjacent to San Isidro, the main financial district. 19 km from Jorge Chavez International Airport and a short distance from the most important shopping centers. The rooms are anti-allergic, have king size beds and double beds, 55-inch Smart TV, steam baths and Bth tub, Sauna. BTH hotel is a transgressive and cosmopolitan space that opens doors and fosters new trends in art, design, fashion and culture. Guests enjoy free Wi-Fi and breakfast included in their rates. The Quimera restaurant proposes a contemporary Peruvian food concept where we use the inputs of our own organic garden. San Borja is a district that is committed to the environment and promotes a healthy life, BTH hotel offers guests courtesy bicycles so they can ride through its parks and appreciate its ecological conditions. Let yourself be welcomed by our highest standards of Health and quality in each of our spaces. The BTH Health anti-stress is an exclusive and private, sensory experience for guests when they begin the relaxation process by starting with the dry room and steam as well as relaxing jets of water from the bath tub. A UNIQUE CONCEPT OF A PRIVATE SPA, PROVIDING A SENSATION OF "REVIVAL, HEALTH, REST AND ESCAPE",

descripcion: For those seeking practicality and the best cost-benefit ratio in Lima, the ibis Lima Larco Miraflores is the perfect choice. With a complete structure, the hotel offers free wi-fi, breakfast with typical dishes of Peruvian cuisine and modern and comfortable rooms. It is a good option for those looking for a cozy place to rest after busy days. The rooms are comfortable and can accommodate families or people with reduced mobility. But if you want a complete cultural experience, you have to go to the QCeviche! Restaurant, which offers Peruvian cuisine in a unique way. There, you will find from traditional recipes to modern dishes. During your stay, try the delicious ceviche or lomo saltado. In addition, the hotel bar opens 24 hours and has a varied cocktail menu. It is an excellent opportunity to try pisco sour, a typical cocktail of the region. The hotel has a privileged location and provides easy access to the main tourist places of the city, such as the Larcomar Shopping Center, which has one of the most impressive views of the city and gathers shops, restaurants, cinemas and bars, the Parque del Amor with the famous sculpture El Beso and the ancient ruins of Huaca Huallamarca, an unmissable archaeological site. But if you want to relax, you must visit Kennedy Park to be connected to nature or appreciate the sunset on the Miraflores Boardwalk. Lima is an incredible destination, where there is much to do. You will not regret taking time to discover the many attractions of the city!

nombre: Costa del Sol Wyndham Lima Airport
descripcion: From an enviable location within mere steps of Jorge Chavez International Airport, easy access to all of Lima's many cultural and historic wonders, and a wealth of upscale services and amenities designed for discerning travelers, our Wyndham Costa del Sol Lima Airport is the premier upscale international hotel in Peru's capital city. Our Lima Airport hotel is perfect for those in transit, with the unparalleled ability to walk to or from your flight within minutes of our front door; with business facilities that are designed to underscore a stress-free, productive stay - including 312-square-meters of flexible, first-class meeting and event space - and 24-hour dining options, we have endeavored to deliver round-the-clock service in a world where round-the-clock is the norm. For those who may be traveling on leisure, or simply seeking relaxation and rejuvenation, our full range of leisure facilities includes a 24-hour Spa with massage services for ultimate relaxation. Add 192 graciously appointed, non-smoking guestrooms that effortlessly fuse form and function, and all equipped with must-have amenities for today's busy traveler, and a restful sojourn is assured. And, best of all, our professional, top-notch associates are at your service 24 hours a day, 7 days a week and look forward to welcoming you with our customary time-honored Peruvian grace and warm hospitality. Rest assured that here at the Wyndham Costa del Sol Lima Airport we treat you like royalty and look forward to being your only hotel of choice when your travels bring you to The City of the Kings - Lima, Peru.

descripcion: From an enviable location within mere steps of Jorge Chavez International Airport, easy access to all of Lima's many cultural and historic wonders, and a wealth of upscale services and amenities designed for discerning travelers, our Wyndham Costa del Sol Lima Airport is the premier upscale international hotel in Peru's capital city. For those who may be traveling on leisure, or simply seeking relaxation and rejuvenation, our full range of leisure facilities includes a 24-hour Spa with massage services for ultimate relaxation. For those seeking practicality and the best cost-benefit ratio in Lima, the ibis Lima Larco Miraflores is the perfect choice. With a complete structure, the hotel offers free wi-fi, breakfast with typical dishes of Peruvian cuisine and modern and comfortable rooms. It is a good option for those looking for a cozy place to rest after busy days. The rooms are comfortable and can accommodate families or people with reduced mobility. But if you want a complete cultural experience, you have to go to the QCeviche! Restaurant, which offers Peruvian cuisine in a unique way. There, you will find from traditional recipes to modern dishes. During your stay, try the delicious ceviche or lomo saltado. In addition, the hotel bar opens 24 hours and has a varied cocktail menu. It is an excellent opportunity to try pisco sour, a typical cocktail of the region. The hotel has a privileged location and provides easy access to the main tourist places of the city, such as the Larcomar Shopping Center, which has one of the most impressive views of the city and gathers shops, restaurants, cinemas and bars, the Parque del Amor with the famous sculpture El Beso and the ancient ruins of Huaca Huallamarca, an unmissable archaeological site. But if you want to relax, you must visit Kennedy Park to be connected to nature or appreciate the sunset on the Miraflores Boardwalk. Lima is an incredible destination, where there is much to do. You will not regret taking time to discover the many attractions of the city!

Once the Miraflores Cesar's, Lima’s fondly remembered, original five-star hotel, this modern icon was dramatically transformed in 2008 into the capital’s newest luxury hotel. Its quintessential Limeno flavor reverberates in the exquisite art collection of contemporary local artists and prized colonial-era antiques, in both public spaces and accommodations. The 17-story hotel, with views over Miraflores and the Pacific coast, offers 148 sophisticated, contemporary luxury rooms and suites, with soundproofing and LCD flatscreen TVs in every room. First-class amenities include a heated, covered pool and breezy terrace, gymnasium with the latest exercise equipment, prestigious Joop salon & massage room, business center, and 5 multimedia-equipped corporate event & meeting rooms.

descripcion: The Westin Lima Hotel & Convention Center is located in Lima’s vibrant financial and shopping district of San Isidro, the hotel is just 15 kilometers from Jorge Chavez International Airport (LIM) aand minutes from a dazzling selection of restaurants, galleries, and parks, as well as banks and corporate headquarters. The hotel features 301 guest rooms with famous Heavenly Bed®, Heavenly Bath® and views of the city. Heavenly Spa by Westin® has 17 treatment rooms, Thermal Circuit, half-size Olympic and indoor pool, Beauty Salon and a fitness center Westin Workout®. The Convention Center has 17 meeting rooms and the largest ballroom is for 1600 people. The hotel has 2 restaurants: Market 770 & Maras, this one under the guide of the renowned chef Rafael Piqueras. It has 4 bars: InSitu Bar with an English style, Lobby Lounge, BarOBar and El Salar has its own personality.

For those seeking practicality and the best cost-benefit ratio in Lima, the ibis Lima Larco Miraflores is the perfect choice. With a complete structure, the hotel offers free wi-fi, breakfast with typical dishes of Peruvian cuisine and modern and comfortable rooms. It is a good option for those looking for a cozy place to rest after busy days. The rooms are comfortable and can accommodate families or people with reduced mobility. But if you want a complete cultural experience, you have to go to the QCeviche! Restaurant, which offers Peruvian cuisine in a unique way. There, you will find from traditional recipes to modern dishes. During your stay, try the delicious ceviche or lomo saltado. In addition, the hotel bar opens 24 hours and has a varied cocktail menu. It is an excellent opportunity to try pisco sour, a typical cocktail of the region. The hotel has a privileged location and provides easy access to the main tourist places of the city, such as the Larcomar Shopping Center, which has one of the most impressive views of the city and gathers shops, restaurants, cinemas and bars, the Parque del Amor with the famous sculpture El Beso and the ancient ruins of Huaca Huallamarca, an unmissable archaeological site. But if you want to relax, you must visit Kennedy Park to be connected to nature or appreciate the sunset on the Miraflores Boardwalk. Lima is an incredible destination, where there is much to do. You will not regret taking time to discover the many attractions of the city!

descripcion: With its stylish contemporary design, cutting-edge technology and ideal location, the flagship Casa Andina Premium Miraflores hotel is the top of its class in every aspect. Once the Miraflores Cesar's, Lima’s fondly remembered, original five-star hotel, this modern icon was dramatically transformed in 2008 into the capital’s newest luxury hotel. Its quintessential Limeno flavor reverberates in the exquisite art collection of contemporary local artists and prized colonial-era antiques, in both public spaces and accommodations. The 17-story hotel, with views over Miraflores and the Pacific coast, offers 148 sophisticated, contemporary luxury rooms and suites, with soundproofing and LCD flatscreen TVs in every room. First-class amenities include a heated, covered pool and breezy terrace, gymnasium with the latest exercise equipment, prestigious Joop salon & massage room, business center, and 5 multimedia-equipped corporate event & meeting rooms.
servicios_ofrecidos: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

descripcion: Hilton Lima Miraflores is ideally located in the heart of the Miraflores district, and within minutes to the vibrant Larcomar entertainment area, providing guests with recreational activities including shopping, theatre, museums, restaurants and parks. Our hotel combines traditional 18th century Peruvian architectonic elements with contemporary décor to create the perfect ambience while delivering the impeccable service demanded from corporate and leisure travelers. Our guestrooms are well-suited for those traveling on business or pleasure. include the Hilton Serenity™ Bed Collection, high speed wireless internet access, alarm clock with MP3 connection, in-room safe, mini-fridge and coffee maker with complimentary coffee. Our 50 deluxe rooms are located on the higher floors including details for offering a more comfortable. Our hotel features 44 well-appointed Executive rooms and 17 suites, all with access to the Executive Lounge and in room high speed internet. Our Lounge is an ideal place to simply relax, watch the news or catch up on emails. A complimentary breakfast, light lunch and dinner are offered daily, additional snacks and beverages are served throughout the day. Our Restaurant and Lounge feature an array of distinctive Peruvian-American fusion flavors, and provides the opportunity to taste the acclaimed Peruvian national cocktail: Pisco Sour. After a delicious meal, unwind with a refreshing beverage at the bar, which opens onto a terrace at street level, filling the space with natural light and creating a pleasant al fresco atmosphere. We offer 9 flexible meeting rooms, including a main ballroom that can accommodate up to 400 guests. Our hotel is adjacent to Daniel A. Carrion Convention Center which holds up to 1,000 attendees in their amphitheater and one block away from Casa Prado Meeting Center. We also provide a 24 hour fully equipped Business Center.

Once the Miraflores Cesar's, Lima’s fondly remembered, original five-star hotel, this modern icon was dramatically transformed in 2008 into the capital’s newest luxury hotel. Its quintessential Limeno flavor reverberates in the exquisite art collection of contemporary local artists and prized colonial-era antiques, in both public spaces and accommodations. The 17-story hotel, with views over Miraflores and the Pacific coast, offers 148 sophisticated, contemporary luxury rooms and suites, with soundproofing and LCD flatscreen TVs in every room. First-class amenities include a heated, covered pool and breezy terrace, gymnasium with the latest exercise equipment, prestigious Joop salon & massage room, business center, and 5 multimedia-equipped corporate event & meeting rooms.

descripcion: With its stylish contemporary design, cutting-edge technology and ideal location, the flagship Casa Andina Premium Miraflores hotel is the top of its class in every aspect. Once the Miraflores Cesar's, Lima’s fondly remembered, original five-star hotel, this modern icon was dramatically transformed in 2008 into the capital’s newest luxury hotel. Its quintessential Limeno flavor reverberates in the exquisite art collection of contemporary local artists and prized colonial-era antiques, in both public spaces and accommodations. The 17-story hotel, with views over Miraflores and the Pacific coast, offers 148 sophisticated, contemporary luxury rooms and suites, with soundproofing and LCD flatscreen TVs in every room. First-class amenities include a heated, covered pool and breezy terrace, gymnasium with the latest exercise equipment, prestigious Joop salon & massage room, business center, and 5 multimedia-equipped corporate event & meeting rooms.
servicios_ofrecidos: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

nombre: The Westin Lima Hotel & Convention Center
descripcion: The Westin Lima Hotel & Convention Center is located in Lima’s vibrant financial and shopping district of San Isidro, the hotel is just 15 kilometers from Jorge Chavez International Airport (LIM) aand minutes from a dazzling selection of restaurants, galleries, and parks, as well as banks and corporate headquarters. The hotel features 301 guest rooms with famous Heavenly Bed®, Heavenly Bath® and views of the city. Heavenly Spa by Westin® has 17 treatment rooms, Thermal Circuit, half-size Olympic and indoor pool, Beauty Salon and a fitness center Westin Workout®. The Convention Center has 17 meeting rooms and the largest ballroom is for 1600 people. The hotel has 2 restaurants: Market 770 & Maras, this one under the guide of the renowned chef Rafael Piqueras. It has 4 bars: InSitu Bar with an English style, Lobby Lounge, BarOBar and El Salar has its own personality.

The hotel has a privileged location and provides easy access to the main tourist places of the city, such as the Larcomar Shopping Center, which has one of the most impressive views of the city and gathers shops, restaurants, cinemas and bars, the Parque del Amor with the famous sculpture El Beso and the ancient ruins of Huaca Huallamarca, an unmissable archaeological site. But if you want to relax, you must visit Kennedy Park to be connected to nature or appreciate the sunset on the Miraflores Boardwalk. Lima is an incredible destination, where there is much to do. You will not regret taking time to discover the many attractions of the city!

nombre: The Westin Lima Hotel & Convention Center
descripcion: The Westin Lima Hotel & Convention Center is located in Lima’s vibrant financial and shopping district of San Isidro, the hotel is just 15 kilometers from Jorge Chavez International Airport (LIM) aand minutes from a dazzling selection of restaurants, galleries, and parks, as well as banks and corporate headquarters. The hotel features 301 guest rooms with famous Heavenly Bed®, Heavenly Bath® and views of the city. Heavenly Spa by Westin® has 17 treatment rooms, Thermal Circuit, half-size Olympic and indoor pool, Beauty Salon and a fitness center Westin Workout®. The Convention Center has 17 meeting rooms and the largest ballroom is for 1600 people. The hotel has 2 restaurants: Market 770 & Maras, this one under the guide of the renowned chef Rafael Piqueras. It has 4 bars: InSitu Bar with an English style, Lobby Lounge, BarOBar and El Salar has its own personality.
servicios_ofrecidos: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

descripcion: Berajá Family Hostel- by travelers for travelers is the perfect place to stay in the center of Lima and share experiences with an autentic peruvian family. We are a family of travelers and for us it is very important that our hosts get the best service we can offer. We also wish that the traveler feels like home and can share his unforgettable expierences during his stay in Peru. In Berajá Family Hostel you will discover how life is with an authentic peruvian family. The hostel is located in the most beautiful and tipycal neighborhood of Lima called Barranco . Close to the hostel you can find all kind of shops and just 10 minutes by walking there is the principal square of the city where you can choose between several bars and restaurants. The beach is just 15 minutes by walking and also Miraflores neighborhood.

nombre: Costa del Sol Wyndham Lima Airport
descripcion: From an enviable location within mere steps of Jorge Chavez International Airport, easy access to all of Lima's many cultural and historic wonders, and a wealth of upscale services and amenities designed for discerning travelers, our Wyndham Costa del Sol Lima Airport is the premier upscale international hotel in Peru's capital city. Our Lima Airport hotel is perfect for those in transit, with the unparalleled ability to walk to or from your flight within minutes of our front door; with business facilities that are designed to underscore a stress-free, productive stay - including 312-square-meters of flexible, first-class meeting and event space - and 24-hour dining options, we have endeavored to deliver round-the-clock service in a world where round-the-clock is the norm. For those who may be traveling on leisure, or simply seeking relaxation and rejuvenation, our full range of leisure facilities includes a 24-hour Spa with massage services for ultimate relaxation. Add 192 graciously appointed, non-smoking guestrooms that effortlessly fuse form and function, and all equipped with must-have amenities for today's busy traveler, and a restful sojourn is assured. And, best of all, our professional, top-notch associates are at your service 24 hours a day, 7 days a week and look forward to welcoming you with our customary time-honored Peruvian grace and warm hospitality. Rest assured that here at the Wyndham Costa del Sol Lima Airport we treat you like royalty and look forward to being your only hotel of choice when your travels bring you to The City of the Kings - Lima, Peru.

descripcion: With its stylish contemporary design, cutting-edge technology and ideal location, the flagship Casa Andina Premium Miraflores hotel is the top of its class in every aspect. Once the Miraflores Cesar's, Lima’s fondly remembered, original five-star hotel, this modern icon was dramatically transformed in 2008 into the capital’s newest luxury hotel. Its quintessential Limeno flavor reverberates in the exquisite art collection of contemporary local artists and prized colonial-era antiques, in both public spaces and accommodations. The 17-story hotel, with views over Miraflores and the Pacific coast, offers 148 sophisticated, contemporary luxury rooms and suites, with soundproofing and LCD flatscreen TVs in every room. First-class amenities include a heated, covered pool and breezy terrace, gymnasium with the latest exercise equipment, prestigious Joop salon & massage room, business center, and 5 multimedia-equipped corporate event & meeting rooms.

descripcion: Vila Santa Hotel is not the largest or most luxurious one, but it is the best one when it comes to service. Our primary goal is to provide to you the best service and comfort so that your stay is bright, easy, and at home. Even more we will provide to you with the services that you need during your stay, so that you can concentrate in your business. The courteous and efficient staff will do their utmost to make your stay a pleasant one.A famous Peruvian chef, Gaston Acurio, once said : "El mas o menos, no es suficiente para que el cliente regrese" (middle terms in service are not going to make customers to come back).
